MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG11 and DG12 postcode areas of Lockerbie and Annan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.08pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to broken overhead equipment near Trailtrow School and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:55pm on Wednesday, 31 March 2021
